quote: Living well is the best revenge.
author: George Herbert

quote: I'm selfish, impatient, and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I'm out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift.
author: Steve Prefontaine

quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
author: Aristotle

quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else - means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
author: Carl Jung

quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: That's your best friend and your worst enemy - your own brain.
author: Fred Durst

quote: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.
author: Willa Cather

quote: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
author: Art Buchwald

quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I did my best, and God did the rest.
author: Hattie McDaniel

quote: I do the very best I know how - the very best I can; and I mean to keep on doing so until the end.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself.
author: Eddie Vedder

quote: The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
author: Robert Browning

quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
author: Al Lopez

quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
author: George Halas

quote: The worst thing that happens to you may be the best thing for you if you don't let it get the best of you.
author: Will Rogers

quote: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: It's a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: The best vision is insight.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Learn to say 'no' to the good so you can say 'yes' to the best.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with courage and with the best that you have to give.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: One of the best things to do sometimes is simply to be.
author: Eric Butterworth

quote: It is best for the wise man not to seem wise.
author: Aeschylus

quote: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Old friends are best.
author: John Selden

quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes only one day at a time.
author: Dean Acheson

quote: At its best, life is completely unpredictable.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: If a man does his best, what else is there?
author: George S. Patton

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work superbly well.
author: William Osler

quote: This is the precept by which I have lived: Prepare for the worst; expect the best; and take what comes.
author: Hannah Arendt

quote: The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous.
author: David Icke

quote: Just do what you do best.
author: Red Auerbach

quote: When things are bad, it's the best time to reinvent yourself.
author: George Lopez

quote: I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God's.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: The best work is not what is most difficult for you; it is what you do best.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: But men are men; the best sometimes forget.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that's fine.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.
author: David Ogilvy

quote: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: The best mirror is an old friend.
author: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

quote: I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Life is best when you are in love.
author: Michael Moriarty

quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for it.
author: Katharine Whitehorn

quote: Enthusiasm is the best protection in any situation. Wholeheartedness is contagious. Give yourself, if you wish to get others.
author: David Seabury

quote: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
author: George Orwell
